mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_product (seq, product_code, product_name, product_price, product_stock, rgstr_date, updt_date) VALUES ((SELECT COALESCE(max(seq),0)+1 AS seq FROM tb_product), #{product_code}, #{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{product_stock}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: select * from tb_product order by rgstr_date desc
mapper.update: update tb_product set product_code = #{product_code}, product_name = #{product_name}, product_price = #{product_price}, product_stock = #{product_stock}, rgstr_date =now() where seq = #{seq}
